short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms browser appearance with vibrant design inspired by refracted light and glowing colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension features a stunning background of prism-like light reflections on a dark canvas, creating an immersive and visually dynamic interface. Perfect for users who seek a modern, futuristic vibe while browsing, Prism Glow also enhances readability and focus with its sharp contrasts and balanced hues.
